overview: An homage to Los Angeles, this film follows five poets and members of a public open call hired to write fifteen-word love letters responding to the heartbreak of the pandemic. Produced in partnership with LA County Library, the poems scroll on LED signs at ten LA County Library locations and place public grief and hope center stage.
tagline: Short Poems to Los Angeles on Heartbreak, Hope, and Love in the Time of Covid
title: Love Letters in Light
